type: Superalgos Review - A New Contributor's Review

definition.text: A review from a very impressed JavaScript developer, potentially a new contributor

paragraphs.text: Amazing work! Well done! I want to contribute to this project, if I find what others may benefit from. So far I'm deeply impressed.

The only thing that annoys me to no end is that, whenever I enter something in the Search input field, I get this browser's pop-up dialog prompting me to save the password. I think that's probably because there are authentication input fields, like "username" and "password", in the same form. I see this page doesn't use form at all, so the whole document becomes a form, and the username/password fields trigger this pop-up on submit.
Sorry for polluting develop branch with my PRs, it took me an effort to figure out the github error I kept getting on app.contribute, all superalgos reported was the following
2023-03-16T15:13:57.102Z [ERROR] httpInterface -> App -> Contribute -> doGit -> err.stack = Error: Logon failed, use ctrl+c to cancel basic credential prompt.
bash: /dev/tty: No such device or address
error: failed to execute prompt script (exit code 1)
fatal: could not read Username for 'https://github.com': No such file or directory
Google helped to find the solution, I had to do git remote set-url origin with my github token authenticated https url,
git remote set-url origin https://fzaitsev:<my github token>@github.com/fzaitsev/Superalgos.git
